DOC.brief_summary: Hepatitis C Virus is constantly evolving genetically, particularly in response to the immune system. This is an observational study to examine if immunosuppressants particularly calcineurin inhibitors taken by transplant patients in order to avoid organ rejection causes predictable changes in the genetics of this virus that might be important in order to treat it effectively.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Trial of Hepatitis C Virus Infected Patients on Calcineurin Inhibitors
